header.title: A new apparel sourcing experience
header.intro:
Save time and build your supply chain in Africa with our on-the-ground support. Pick and choose from our range of services tailored to your business needs.


With more than 30 years working with international brands, we offer an end-to-end solution that makes apparel sourcing fast and easy!
Save time and future-proof your supply chain. Having our office in Mauritius and Madagascar, we help you take advantage of the competitive edge and preferential trade agreements of the region.

services.title: Factory Compliance
services.text: We offer support to finders to find a socially compliant factory.  We also help SMEs connect with relevant compliance companies.

services.title: Raw Material Monitoring
services.text: Our team carefully tracks raw material from order to ensure timely production.

services.title: Product Development & Sampling
services.text: Provide your tech pack, target price and delivery date - we turn your concept to finished product with the best quality and fit.

services.title: Order Follow-up
services.text: As your virtual partner, we provide full transparency with  updates on the production timeline and different stages.

services.title: Quality Control
services.text: Pre-production meetings, quality checks and final inspections are scheduled with our team of experts to ensure your products pass mandatory testings according to customersâ€™ AQL.

services.title: Logistics & Distribution
services.text: We partner with the best forwarding companies and track your order until shipping destination. Or we  connect you directly with forwarders to find the best available shipping rates by sea and air.

africa.title: Capacity for small to large buyers
